rows.segment_description: Google Cloud provides AI-optimized infrastructure, development platforms, and cloud services to help organizations solve business challenges, improve productivity, reduce costs, and drive growth through innovative AI-powered tools and applications.

Google Services includes consumer-facing products that organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful, helping people find information, get things done, and access entertainment and learning opportunities.
Other Bets comprises non-Google businesses within Alphabet that focus on innovative and moonshot projects aimed at solving big problems and advancing new technologies beyond Google’s core services.
